accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: National Academy of Arbitrators Archives Project Records #6316. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 5246: NAA Records 5775: NAA Records 5985: NAA Additional Files Regarding Proceedings 6004: NAA Additional Records 6004 AV: NAA Audio-Visual Material 6004 OHM: NAA History Committee Oral History Interview Masters 6004 OHT: NAA History Committee Oral History Interview Transcripts 6136: Dennis Nolan Collection of National Academy of Arbitrators History Files 6204: NAA Restricted Committee Files

scopecontent.p: Includes resumes for several individuals working on the project. B.N.: May contain SSNs.
Includes one 3.5" floppy disc and the print-out of the files on the Backup CD (see "box 2" for actual CD).
